title: Bug 123044 - Page break not occurring in the first item when previewing attached file in PDF
description:
Description: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item is not occurring.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached file in bug 1228982.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item is not occurring.
SR: Open the attached file from bug 1228982 and preview it in PDF format.
